Title: The Animals
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Lauren Morelli, Jordan Harrison (story editor), Piper Kerman (based on the book by)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: Alliances shift among the prison "families" as Piscatella and his guards crack down. Poussey, Judy and Alex prefer to look ahead to the future.
